TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBuildEngine2 implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine

summary.span: 提供了一种使任务作者可以使用 MSBuild 引擎的功能子集的方法。

span.span: Provides a way for task authors to use a subset of the functionality of the MSBuild engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展，从而可以在包含多个处理器或具有多个内核的处理器的系统上生成并行的多个项目文件。 extends , allowing you to build multiple project files in parallel on systems containing multiple processors, or processors with multiple cores.

Initiates a build of a project file.

summary.span: 如果生成成功，则返回指定目标的输出（如果存在任何输出）。

span.span: If the build is successful, the outputs of the specified targets are returned, if any exist.

returns.span: 如果生成成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the build was successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未不指定任何目标，[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]生成项目的默认目标。If no targets are specified, [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] builds the default targets of the project. 目标输出返回作为数组按目标名称进行索引。Target outputs are returned as arrays indexed by target name.

summary.span: 允许任务在包含多个处理器或具有多个内核的处理器的系统上启动并行生成指定项目文件。

span.span: Allows tasks to initiate parallel builds of the specified project files on systems with multiple processors or multiple core processors.

summary.span: 如果生成成功，则返回指定目标的输出（如果存在任何输出）。

span.span: If the builds are successful, the outputs of the specified targets are returned, if any exist.

returns.span: 如果生成成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the build succeeded, if otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同时`targetNames`和`targetOutputs`接受`null`值。Both `targetNames` and `targetOutputs` accept `null` values. 如果未不指定任何目标，然后生成的默认目标。If no targets are specified, then the default targets are built. 目标输出返回作为数组按目标名称进行索引。Target outputs are returned as arrays indexed by target name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsRunningMultipleNodes As Boolean
public: property bool IsRunningMultipleNodes { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回系统是在单处理器模式下运行还是在多处理器模式下运行。

span.span: Returns whether the system is running in single- or multi-processor mode.

value.span: 如果系统在多处理器模式下运行，则返回 ，否则返回 。

span.span: if the system is running in multi-processor mode, otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成引擎处于单处理器模式 (`IsRunningMultipleNodes` = `false`) 时它进行初始化的等于 1 的 Cpu 数和生成引擎不是子引擎。The build engine is in single-processor mode (`IsRunningMultipleNodes` = `false`) when it is initialized with the number of CPUs equal to 1 and the build engine is not a child engine. 生成引擎是在多处理器模式下 (`IsRunningMultipleNodes` = `true`) 初始化与大量的 Cpu 大于 1，或者当生成引擎是子引擎。The build engine is in multi-processor mode (`IsRunningMultipleNodes` = `true`) when it is initialized with a number of CPUs greater than 1, or when the build engine is a child engine.
